title: Chapter 1448 - Climbing The Stairs
body:
Chapter 1448 - Climbing The Stairs

The old long-robed bald man’s voice rang out, rife with mockery. “Trying to avoid your problems won't solve them!” 

Su Yi chuckled, but he couldn’t be bothered to argue. He just shot toward the Path of Endless Tribulations. 

The old man seemed to sense the implied meaning of Su Yi’s laughter, and his expression instantly stiffened, becoming rather unsightly.

If they were to accuse each other of avoiding problems, well, he’d hidden himself right from the start out of fear of the power of reincarnation. He dared not clash with Su Yi head-on. Thus, his words were effectively a slap in his own face!

Meanwhile, Su Yi reached the first stone step of the Path of Endless Tribulations.

The stone steps were each as black as ink and covered in strange, intricate Dao Markings, similar to those on the thousand-foot stone stele outside. 

Su Yi didn’t hesitate.

Boom!

The moment he stepped onto the first stone step, the sound of the Dao rumbled and boomed. The scenery instantly transformed around him, manifesting a blood-colored heaven and earth.

Su Yi could tell what was going on at a glance.

“Each step, a different heaven and earth....
